definition: coleoptile, protective sheath covering an emerging shoot (botany)
semipolished rice (i.e. rice minus the husk, but including the germ)

sentences.english: Oil "is" extracted from wheat germ bacteria of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 小麦胚芽油是从细菌中提取的小麦籽粒。

sentences.english: When grains are refined, the bran and the germ are removed.
sentences.chinese: 加工过的谷物把麸皮和胚芽去除了。

sentences.english: The bran and germ hold the bulk of the nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 麸皮和胚芽是营养品的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: Or use whole-wheat flour and sprinkle wheat germ on your food.
sentences.chinese: 或者食用全麦食物和附和吃些小麦胚芽。

sentences.english: The whole wheat germs contain lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 完整的小麦胚芽含有卵磷脂。

sentences.english: The refining process removes the bran and germ from the grain.
sentences.chinese: 因为在谷物精制过程中，麸皮和胚芽都被脱除了。

sentences.english: Inactivation of lipase in wheat germ by microwave was studied in this paper .
sentences.chinese: 要研究了利用微波技术钝化小麦胚芽中解脂酶的方法。

sentences.english: Epidermal buds grow down into the dermis at these sites.
sentences.chinese: 在这些部位，表皮胚芽向下生出息入真皮。

sentences.english: The germ of the race is in your mother's longing.
sentences.chinese: 人类的胚芽是在你母亲的愿望里。

sentences.english: Wheat germ oil is unrefined vegetable oils, natural.
sentences.chinese: 小麦胚芽油是一种未经提炼的天然植物油。

sentences.english: The only thing you should do to eat two or three tablespoons of what germs per day.
sentences.chinese: 你唯一应该做的事是每天吃二或三汤匙小麦胚芽。
小麦的胚芽对增进健康很有好处。

sentences.english: The coleoptile contains very little chlorophyll and is usually light-sensitive .
sentences.chinese: 胚芽鞘内含少量的叶绿素并且通常是感光的。

sentences.english: Lycione inhibits the cell elongation of wheat coleoptile and the activity of peroxidase also.
sentences.chinese: 石蒜碱处理的小麦胚芽鞘切段细胞延长明显被抑制。

sentences.english: Water stress obviously restrain growth of coleoptile and main radical.
sentences.chinese: 水分胁迫明显抑制了胚芽鞘和主胚根的生长。

sentences.english: Mixes the cold dish fragrance with the corn plumule oil accent to be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 用玉米胚芽油调拌凉菜香味宜人。

definition: yolk sac (ectodermal cells attaching fetus to uterus before the development of the placenta)
semipolished rice (i.e. rice minus the husk, but including the germ)
